MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the LL17 postcode area of St. Asaph. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 1:25am. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of onsite difficulties and our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 10AM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 4.05AM on 15th April 2021.
